AboutUs.mainHeader: Job Plus, a leading Saudi platform in job advertising, was founded in 2022 and since our establishment,We have been working on connecting organizations and companies with job seekers.
AboutUs.whyUs: We aim to provide an exceptional work experience for companies and job seekers
AboutUs.whyUs2: by facilitating their connection and providing suitable opportunities
AboutUs.visionText: We strive to make the recruitment process easy and streamlined for job seekers, and to attract the best talents and competencies for companies.

JobSeeker.Features: Features of the Job Plus App
JobSeeker.FeaturesOne: Diverse jobs from Riyadh and all regions of the kingdom.
JobSeeker.FeaturesTwo: Complete your profile and apply for your job with a click of a button.
JobSeeker.FeaturesThree: Ready-to-use CV templates with ATS features that save your time and effort.
JobSeeker.AboutJobPlus: 'Job Plus' is an application that makes it easy for you to search for a job and access many companies and job opportunities in one place. Job Plus stands out with a range of services that make the job search process easier and more efficient, where you can complete your personal data only once, and then apply for many job opportunities easily with a click of a button without re-entering the data. This saves you time and effort in searching and applying, increasing your chances of getting the right job for you. You can also prepare your resume through professional ready-made resume templates in the application, review and download them. Through the Job Plus app, you can identify the suitable job for you and make a faster decision due to the matching percentage that indicates how suitable you are for the offered job, as well as the availability of comprehensive information about the job. Lastly, when applying for jobs, a bar appears indicating the application status from the beginning until acceptance, increasing user satisfaction and reducing their anxiety due to companies not responding in other applications.
JobSeeker.opportunities: Everyone has a job opportunity with Job Plus

ValidationErrors.fullName: Must be between 2 and 100 characters and can only contain letters, numbers, and Arabic characters.
ValidationErrors.companyName: Must be between 2 and 50 characters and can only contain letters and Arabic characters.
ValidationErrors.mobileNumber: Number must be 4 digits min ~ 15 digit max
ValidationErrors.password: Must contain a combination of uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers,  symbols, and 8 characters Minimum.
